explanation: The stage direction describes the character taking an object (a 'demi Cercle' from his pocket) and using it (pointing it at a cane he is holding). This fits the definition of the 'object' category as it involves manipulating an object.
stgdir: Il tire de sa poche un demi Cercle, et le braque sur une canne qu'il tient à la main, et qui sert d'appui.
